content.text: To design a website for a beatmaker.
I designed this website using generative animation for the initial block and audio-visualization.
Ascetic, dark-colored, formal design was used as a wrapper for the main part – music.
The initial block animation reflects the author’s style – electronic music, hip-hop. This includes collages of patterns, pictures of tapes, colorful figures, and typography.

The player itself was designed as a nostalgic reference to audiotapes. The audio-visualization is being generated according to the settings of each track, as well. Every visualization can be used for designing posts on social networks.
The website was designed to be used on every type of device, including mobile devices.
